title: API Key Rotation
description: An analyst must rotate the secret API key for a critical service that integrates with a third-party vendor.

tasks.description: Coordinate a maintenance window with the application owner and the third-party vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully schedules the key rotation.

tasks.description: Generate a new, strong, random API key.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new secure key is generated.

tasks.description: During the maintenance window, update the key in both the internal application's configuration and the third-party vendor's portal, then test the integration.
tasks.expected_outcome: The key is successfully rotated without causing a lasting service outage.
